entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 60%
